import React, { Component, useState } from "react"; import { Modal, Button, Row, Col, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; class FriendTrans extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); } async componentDidMount() { await fetch("http://localhost:3000/members") .then(async (res) => await res.json()) .then((json) => { this.setState({ isLoaded: true, members: json, }); }); } render() { return (

); } } export default FriendTrans;
